title: Order Title and Escrow Services
description: For a new transaction, the TC needs to open escrow and order a preliminary title report.

tasks.description: Retrieve the purchase agreement and contact information for the chosen title/escrow company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the contract and the contact details for the specified escrow officer.

tasks.description: Email the purchase agreement to the escrow officer with a request to open escrow.
tasks.expected_outcome: A correctly formatted email with the contract attached is sent to the escrow officer.

tasks.description: Log the escrow number and preliminary title report delivery date in the transaction management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The TC updates the transaction file with the escrow # and sets a task reminder for the title report.
